short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly jot down a note and then get right back to work

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Plexus Notes extension allows you to quickly jot down any notes that pop into your head while browsing other sites. Eliminate the need to navigate to another tab or app, disturbing your focus and messing up your train of thought. Just open our extension, write down a note, and get back to work.
